Title: Lawful Processing Conditions (Sensitive Personal Data) - Irish Act
Details:
Section 2(b) of the Irish Data Protection Act

The following are valid Lawful processing conditions for processing sensitive personal data.

Explicit consent of the data subject
Obligations in connection with employment
Vital interests of the data subject or another person
Legitimate activities of a not for profit organisation
Information deliberately made public by the data subject
Administration of Justice/Lawful purpose/Government function
Processing necessary in relation to legal rights
Medical purposes
Statistical purposes
Processing by political parties
Substantial public interest
Assessment or collection of tax
Administration of Social Welfare
Author: John Ghent
